subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Three years ago, Dr. Gerald Bortolazzo was told he had terminal cancer. He sold his company, but then received a new diagnosis. With a new lease on life, he bought his first racehorse late last year.
snippet: Three years ago, Dr. Gerald Bortolazzo was told he had terminal cancer. He sold his company, but then received a new diagnosis. With a new lease on life, he bought his first racehorse late last year.
